entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 2:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 63 %

Dewpoint: -11.2°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Flurries beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this evening then northwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
